page.title: 12TOURISM IN CHARD
page.content: At the time this is being written (in mid July)Chard is very busy as it is the summer season.Most of the people come here from the London area.They visit places like Chard Museum,Chard School,Guildhall,Pubs,Cricket St. Thomas Wildlife Park and the Old Peoples Homes. Chard Museum was the most popular place people visit.It is in part of a row of old cottages at the top of the town called Godworthy House. There are many different rooms on interesting subjects.There is a room on waggons,John Stringfellow (Invented one of the first aeroplanes),Sidney James Gillingham (invented artifical limbs),Victorian childhood and many more. There are over six guest houses and hotels in Chard.The largest has around twenty bed-rooms.
